name: The Tale of Lukas
description:
Lukas is a friendly traveler, who loves visiting other places and making new friends. One problem - he's lost his memory! Play this game and let him meet new friends and fellow travelers! Maybe you'll even figure out why he lost his memory!

This game has:

-A total of 16 recruitable characters (not including Lukas).
-A total of 13 monsters (I know, that's not a lot, but I'll update eventually with more).
-A whole plethora of towns and characters to explore and meet!

I also plan to add a guide of some sort, if you'd be interested in that!
